channel.title: Special bar (the green area)
channel.description:
Well the green area don't seem to update whenever I use a special attack of any sort. It works on my old client that I used for SwarIsle, but that client is no more. But trying it on my new client (the one in downloads section) I get this:
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=30ur51e&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=30ur51e&s=4[/url]
The special Ammount does update, but not the green part.
